Articles.Content:
In the spoiler below is a config example for some custom Future suits.

I have also made a custom emissive (the configurable bit of the suit that lights up), but have no idea how to add a config line to get it to show up correctly.

Anyone have any ideas on how to get the emissive to show up using the stock suit picker?

I already use texture replacer and can get it to show up there. I'm not asking about a work around.

Cheers.

Spoiler

    SUITCOMBO
    {
        displayName = Yellow
        suitType = Future
        gender = Male
        name = Yellow
        suitTexture = Suits/Future/Textures/Yellow

        EMISSIVE THINGY GOES HERE = Suits/Future/Textures/yellowEmissive

        normalTexture = Suits/Future/Textures/Yellow
        visorTexture = Suits/Future/Visor_D
        sprite = Suits/Future/Icons/yellow_m
        primaryColor = #blablabla
        secondaryColor = #blablabla
    }

    SUITCOMBO
    {
        displayName = Yellow
        suitType = Future
        gender = Female
        name = Yellow
        suitTexture = Suits/Future/Textures/Yellow

        EMISSIVE THINGY GOES HERE = Suits/Future/Textures/yellowEmissive

        normalTexture = Suits/Future/Textures/Yellow
        visorTexture = Suits/Future/Visor_D
        sprite = Suits/Future/Icons/yellow_f
        primaryColor = #blablabla
        secondaryColor = #blablabla
    }

 

Edited July 16, 2021 by DirtyFace83
